ingredients: +   1/2 cup unsalted butter, 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour,   +   1/2 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup packed brown sugar,   +   1/4 cup lemon juice, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 (14.1 ounce) package 9-inch pie crusts, 3 pounds Fuyu persimmons - peeled, cored, and sliced, 1 tablespoon cinnamon sugar, or to taste
